page.title: 16TOURISM 2
page.content: Mark of Friendship Inn. Accommodation for 4 guests,-Winter and Summer.Guests from all over the world. {Lakeside Kennels.}-situated at Wear Cottages,owned by Mrs.Staples. Occupying a quarter of an acre. Accommodation for 10 dogs per week, costs Â£2.30 per day for dogs.Â£1.25 per day for cats. {Chalets.}The chalets on the cliffs are lived in by the owner or rented out to tourists.People mostly rent them out in Summer for holidays.Some are rented out as Winter homes. Some owners live in their chalets all year.Chalets for holiday letting are advertised locally in hardware shop or local Western Evening Herald.
